ail Operations CGR <Retail.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; MUSE Operations <MUSE.Operations@chalhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-03-19 17:05
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | DEBEERS- Dubai Mall 
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of DE BEERS– DUBAI MALL.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 19th Mar 2025 at 10am. 

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team, @Romy Ammar <mailto:Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com> @Christopher Matsumoto <mailto:Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com> @DeBeers Dubaimall <mailto:DeBeers.Dubaimall@chalhoub.com> @Nabhan Muhammed Sareef <mailto:Nabhan.Sareef@chalhoub.com> @Kiran Vijay <mailto:Kiran.Vijay@chalhoub.com>

*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com>
